Question: Mullen Automotive, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Mullen Automotive, Inc.

Product: Mullen Five RS

- Fully electric sport EV crossover
- Dual motors with All-Wheel Drive (AWD)
- Packs over 1000 horsepower and over 850 ft lbs of torque
- 800-volt battery architecture
- Max speed of about 200 miles per hour
- 0-60 miles per hour in just under two seconds
- 100 kWh battery with level 3 charging capability
- Infotainment center with integrated navigation, Apple CarPlay, and Android Auto
- AI copilot called PERSONA for driving assistance
- Impressive stopping power with Brembo carbon ceramic brakes
- Deliveries expected to start in 2025
Summary_cn:
Mullen汽车公司

产品：Mullen Five RS

- 完全电动的运动型跨界车
- 双电机，全轮驱动（AWD）
- 功率超过1000马力，扭矩超过850英尺磅
- 800伏电池架构
- 最高时速约200英里
- 0至60英里/小时加速时间不到两秒
- 100千瓦时电池，支持三级充电
- 配备集成导航、Apple CarPlay和Android Auto的信息娱乐中心
- 名为PERSONA的AI驾驶助手
- 配备博慕碳陶瓷刹车，制动效果惊人
- 预计于2025年开始交付
